å¤šé¤˜å•¦ï¼Œgoogle adæŠ½åˆ°ä¹œå’ï¼Œä»²ä¸å¦‚ç›´æ¥èª²é‡‘
Let's assume the best possible payout, $5/1000 views. That's $1/200 views. A view counts as watching an ad for at least 30 seconds (if you skip an ad before that it does NOT give them any money). That's 100 minutes of work for $1. You'd be better off flipping burgers at McDonalds and giving 1/5 of that money to your creator than watching ads. Any creator who respects and cares about their fans agrees which is why many creators have moved to making their money from platforms like Patreon.
